title: Healthcare Analytics Dashboard
summary: Analyzed patient records to monitor vitals, detect anomalies, and visualize KPIs.

title: Recommendation System
summary: Developed a personalized movie recommendation system using collaborative filtering and matrix factorization techniques to enhance user experience and engagement.

title: Hand Tracking & Color-Based Cursor
summary: Implemented a real-time hand tracking system that detects hand gestures and controls the mouse cursor using color-based detection and OpenCV, enhancing interactive applications.

title: Handwriting Recognition System
summary: Developed a machine learning-based system to recognize and digitize handwritten text from images, improving accuracy with preprocessing and feature extraction techniques.

title: E-Commerce Platform
summary: Built a full-stack e-commerce web application with product management, shopping cart, and payment integration for seamless online shopping experience.

title: Voice Command Code Executor
summary: Created a system that executes Python code based on voice commands, combining speech recognition and dynamic code execution for hands-free programming.

title: Webcam-Based Eye Control
summary: Developed an eye-tracking system using webcam input to control the mouse cursor and interface, assisting users with accessibility needs.

title: Electric Vehicle Chatbot
summary: Built an interactive chatbot for PakWheels to guide users on electric vehicle features, pricing, and recommendations, enhancing customer support and engagement.
